name: Crystal Plates Database
description: Laboratory plate and data management system with dual interfaces for scientific data

CACHE_DATABASE_NAME.description: Cache database name (optional, defaults to main DB)

QUEUE_DATABASE_NAME.description: Queue database name (optional, defaults to main DB)

CABLE_DATABASE_NAME.description: Cable database name (optional, defaults to main DB)

JOB_CONCURRENCY.description: Number of job worker processes (Solid Queue)

SOLID_QUEUE_POLLING_INTERVAL.description: Polling interval for Solid Queue workers (seconds)

SOLID_QUEUE_THREADS.description: Number of threads per Solid Queue worker process

ACTIVE_STORAGE_SERVICE.description: Set to 'stackhero' for Stackhero MinIO, 'amazon' for AWS S3, or 'local' for local storage

SCXRD_DISABLE_BULK_IMAGE_LOADING.description: Disable bulk image loading to prevent memory issues on small dynos

MINIO_ENDPOINT.description: Stackhero MinIO endpoint URL (only needed if using stackhero service)

MINIO_ACCESS_KEY.description: Stackhero MinIO access key (only needed if using stackhero service)

MINIO_SECRET_KEY.description: Stackhero MinIO secret key (only needed if using stackhero service)

MINIO_BUCKET.description: Stackhero MinIO bucket name (only needed if using stackhero service)

MINIO_REGION.description: Stackhero MinIO region (only needed if using stackhero service)

AWS_REGION.description: AWS region for S3 storage (only needed if using S3)

AWS_S3_BUCKET.description: S3 bucket name for file storage (only needed if using S3)

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS access key for S3 (only needed if using S3)

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret key for S3 (only needed if using S3)
